review:
nice comedy, family film. lots of gags to laugh at. like "uncle sawaal dus crore ka kyu band ho gya?" or when raj (salman) teaches bunty (ajay nagrath) to compose a copy of "karz" song to secretly mock rajesh (rishi kapoor). 

music is fantastic thanks to himesh reshammiya and aadesh srivastav.

salman is nice, rishi, anupam, are excellent! ameesha patel is just supporting actor...nothing much to do here for her.
wow so emotional and great movie ...i like the star casting of father and son  ie. salman khan & rishi kapoor . i loved that movie.
i love this film bus especially the music directed and composed by himesh reshammiya
this movie is fun, entertaining and li'l bit drama too.very nice songs.
awesome movie and song is to good
this film is very nice film.t his story is very good story.
awesome movie. luv you salman bhai.
